results.name: Decimal expansion of Sum_{m>=1} 1/(m^2 + 1).
comment: Essentially the same as A100554 and A113319. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 06 2015
link: Muniru A Asiru, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..3000
Junyong Zhao, Shaofang Hong, Xiao Jiang, A certain reciprocal power sum is never an integer, arXiv:1812.08705 [math.NT], 2018. See the constant alpha_f.
formula: Equals Integral_{x=0..oo} sin(x)/(exp(x) - 1) dx. - _Amiram Eldar_, Aug 16 2020
results.author: _José María Grau Ribas_, Jun 19 2015
